description.narrative: COs and partners are supported by ROSA to accelerate the reduction and prevention of out-of-school girls and boys and improve learning outcomes from early childhood to adolescence.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: COs and partners are supported by ROSA to accelerate the reduction and prevention of out-of-school girls and boys and improve learning outcomes from early childhood to adolescence.

description.narrative: Through regular programming on cross-sectoral work focused on ECD, adolescents, systems strengthening and innovations, ROSA continues to support Governments reduce OOSC numbers, decrease gender disparities, and raise learning levels. Since March 2020, in response to the Covid-19 pandemic, ROSA has expanded the education team to provide technical assistance to COs and Governments on developing education response plans: this includes guidance and tools to strengthen continuity of learning during school closures, plans for re-opening including how to re-imagine the future of education by building back an education system that is safer for children, more equitable and inclusive. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/08/2020

title.narrative: Early Childhood Education: # of UNICEF-supported countries with national policy, costed plans and standards for ECE
Systems strengthening: EMIS (link to OOSC): # of UNICEF-supported countries with monitoring systems (e.g.: EMIS) on OOSC, children with disabilities and early warning of school dropouts
Costing/investments for children: # of UNICEF-supported countries assisted with costing of interventions and investment cases
Advocacy Events # of high level events informed by robust evidence on OOSC, ECD and gender equality in education

target.value: 2020:6 (Girls Education Challenge, SAARC consultation on school reopening, 5Year Progress Review on SDG4, APMED, ARNEC, Youth Skills and solutions virtual forum)

title.narrative: OOSC/Gender Equity # of countries supported by ROSA to integrate OOSC, into gender responsive and risk-informed costed sector plans
# of countries supported by UNICEF with targeted strategies to promote multiple pathways for education and skills, for adolescents, especially for girls
# of countries supported by UNICEF to develop effective education systems for monitoring and promoting improved learning outcomes.
Knowledge products # of ROSA products advancing the knowledge on ECD, learning, Secondary Education and risk-informed programming
